headline: Global Protective Clothing Market Projected to Reach USD 15.06 Billion by 2030, Fueled by Advances in Textile Engineering and Workplace Safety Mandates
summary: The global protective clothing market, valued at USD 10.99 billion in 2024, is anticipated to reach USD 15.06 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 5.48%. Key advancements in textile engineering, such as lighter and more durable high-performance fibers like aramids and advanced polyethylene, enhance protection and comfort across diverse industry sectors. The polyamide segment is prominent, offering durability in construction and mining, while the visibility segment sees heightened demand due to

headline: DuPont Introduces DuPont™ AmberLite™ FPA57 Resin to Boost Efficiency in Organic Acid Purification
summary: DuPont (NYSE: DD) today announced the launch of DuPont™ AmberLite™ FPA57 resin, an innovative weak base anion resin designed to support the growing needs of organic acid manufacturers.
